{{flavour|An amulet which exerts a force that blocks some incoming attacks, and can even reflect any blocked ranged attacks back towards the attacker.}}
Wearing an [[amulet of reflection]] provides 5 [[SH]] and the [[reflection]] ego. When projectiles (either ranged weapons or certain types of spells like [[Stone Arrow]]) are blocked, they are always reflected back at the attacker.

==Strategy==
This amulet's +5 SH is a fairly strong bonus to your defense. Unlike other amulets, the SH bonus is consistent: it doesn't wear off like [[acrobat]], or require MP as with [[guardian spirit]]. Therefore, it is a strong option for just about any character. But certain characters may want another amulet for its properties.

The ability to reflect projectiles can be useful, particularly against ranged enemies like [[centaur (monster)|centaurs]] and [[yaktaur]]s. But the reflection is a minor benefit when compared to the SH bonus. Note that players with higher SH (from [[shield]]s or other sources) will block more often, so will reflect projectiles more often. 

==See Also==
*[[Brooch of Shielding]] - [[unrand]] amulet that grants more SH, but with [[guardian spirit]] instead of reflection.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.26]], in order to function, the amulet had to attune itself to the wearer at full health.
*Prior to [[0.25]], amulets of reflection provided 2 to 6 SH and did not require attunement at full HP.
*The amulet of reflection was added in [[0.18]].
